title: moviestar
author: moviestar
content: was wondering if anyone has some good altcoin calls like for day trading, i heard about them as well as NFT calls and seems like a good way to get into investing... I know people sell these "calls" so ill be willing to pay.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: Quote from: moviestar on May 17, 2022, 05:08:27 AMwas wondering if anyone has some good altcoin calls like for day trading, i heard about them as well as NFT calls and seems like a good way to get into investing... I know people sell these "calls" so ill be willing to pay. Probably medium or high tier tokens that on the top 100 CMC. The fact that when you are looking for the daily trade and you may seek for the volatile asset in the market and i just know that when you are watching the market and it seems whole of market is still in the bearish trend for now. Scalping luna was good but this is too risky for you if you didn't know how to play but i guess what about to go to the some tokens on the binance like metaverse tokens? This is first time to see that someone called NFT was a good way to investing while we know that so well of NFT was illiquid asset. That sounds nonsense to call NFT as investment

comments.author: crypto-project
comments.body: Quote from: moviestar on May 17, 2022, 05:08:27 AMwas wondering if anyone has some good altcoin calls like for day trading, i heard about them as well as NFT calls and seems like a good way to get into investing... I know people sell these "calls" so ill be willing to pay. You can try trading BNB and I think that it is less volatile and easier to trade on the daily timeframe. But that's just my recommendation, you better research it before investing in a coin.

comments.author: yayayo
comments.body: Quote from: crypto-project on May 17, 2022, 09:21:22 AMQuote from: moviestar on May 17, 2022, 05:08:27 AMwas wondering if anyone has some good altcoin calls like for day trading, i heard about them as well as NFT calls and seems like a good way to get into investing... I know people sell these "calls" so ill be willing to pay. You can try trading BNB and I think that it is less volatile and easier to trade on the daily timeframe. But that's just my recommendation, you better research it before investing in a coin.There's no such thing as less volatile coins, all of them are but I think BNB is a good recommendation as well as trading some ADA and SOL they are also a good coins for day trading just skip coins that has low in volume as they are much more volatile than this coins.ya.ya.yo!

comments.author: RussianEnglishTranslation
comments.body: Quote from: moviestar on May 17, 2022, 05:08:27 AMwas wondering if anyone has some good altcoin calls like for day trading, i heard about them as well as NFT calls and seems like a good way to get into investing... I know people sell these "calls" so ill be willing to pay. You could flip NFTs but you need to be in a discord community that gets info before others on which ones to buy. As to swing trading, pick something with a high marketcap. Personally, I never trade because most traders lose money. You can't predict the market and TA is a scam. I earn 28% APY staking ICP and that works best for me. DYOR

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: moviestar on May 17, 2022, 05:08:27 AMwas wondering if anyone has some good altcoin calls like for day trading, i heard about them as well as NFT calls and seems like a good way to get into investing... I know people sell these "calls" so ill be willing to pay. Be careful with some new nft. They might not be profitable especially when they are no hype at all. Nft becomes profitable if its getting hype on social media and if no news or trend on a project you invested then thats something scary I think. For altcoins stay only on major coins or those who got a lot of volume.

comments.author: ItsCrafty
comments.body: Quote from: moviestar on May 17, 2022, 05:08:27 AMwas wondering if anyone has some good altcoin calls like for day trading, i heard about them as well as NFT calls and seems like a good way to get into investing... I know people sell these "calls" so ill be willing to pay. No need to pay for any signals. No one can judge 100% correct. You can also learn chart and use RSI. There are some coin which are so volatile and very good for day trading . You can use these coins for day trading but it's better to learn charts reading before trading. Loka token is best for day trading and you will find it very volatile and can make daily profit.

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: moviestar on May 17, 2022, 05:08:27 AMwas wondering if anyone has some good altcoin calls like for day trading, i heard about them as well as NFT calls and seems like a good way to get into investing... I know people sell these "calls" so ill be willing to pay. They're called signals. Well, to be honest, they could just be disturbing to you as most of these signals aren't really going to give you signals that you people have believed.They're more of the call of those owners and mere trades by them. Learn on your own through trading and use that money for paying in actual experience.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: moviestar on May 17, 2022, 05:08:27 AMI know people sell these "calls" so ill be willing to pay. Bad idea. I'm 99.99% sure no one will sell you any good calls, people will never share real ways to make money, and often sell all kinds of junk on which you can't earn anything. So it is better to study yourself than to pay someone money for nothing, on which you can only lose money. Your scheme involves double risk. First, you risk losing money for signals which are pacifier, and then you risk losing money on trading.

comments.author: moviestar

First, you risk losing money for signals which are pacifier, and then you risk losing money on trading.you are sadly mistaken, there is a whole market out there for these signals, I am currently up $5,000 from NFT signals

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: moviestar on May 17, 2022, 05:08:27 AMwas wondering if anyone has some good altcoin calls like for day trading, i heard about them as well as NFT calls and seems like a good way to get into investing... I know people sell these "calls" so ill be willing to pay. Personally, I would prefer to do my own research instead of joining groups for trading calls. Because what they are about to say is not 100% true. But even so, I still join some trading call groups just to find out what they think about the current crypto market. For NFT, I suggest you to look for the latest trends on Twitter, there are lots of people sharing about NFT there.

comments.author: Coin BTC
comments.body: Quote from: moviestar on May 17, 2022, 05:08:27 AMwas wondering if anyone has some good altcoin calls like for day trading, i heard about them as well as NFT calls and seems like a good way to get into investing... I know people sell these "calls" so ill be willing to pay. it seems my advice you better take the initiative to invest in BNB, and in this BNB coin you can also trade in the short term and in the daily timeframe and also here it's very easy not too difficult, many people recommend it, I also include into it, but you need to remember you should also research before investing in any altcoin, it's best and my advice you should consider it well and very carefully so that later you will not experience losses in investing.And maybe there's one more thing I want to talk about about the relationship related to NFT, the first thing we know is that NFT is not an illiquid asset in his view. , and my little advice you should be careful with NFT, especially with the new NFT.

comments.author: Jaered
comments.body: I know one can swing trade his or her way to profit, but then that's a tough call with the market the way it is. About NFTs, that seems a strange one to me, because I don't even know how it is done. Anyway good luck

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: moviestar on May 17, 2022, 08:18:47 PMQuote from: Xal0lex on May 17, 2022, 07:57:39 PMQuote from: moviestar on May 17, 2022, 05:08:27 AMI know people sell these "calls" so ill be willing to pay. Bad idea. I'm 99.99% sure no one will sell you any good calls, people will never share real ways to make money, and often sell all kinds of junk on which you can't earn anything. So it is better to study yourself than to pay someone money for nothing, on which you can only lose money. Your scheme involves double risk. First, you risk losing money for signals which are pacifier, and then you risk losing money on trading.you are sadly mistaken, there is a whole market out there for these signals, I am currently up $5,000 from NFT signals Everyone makes money by word of mouth, I'm not going to argue  I agree about the market, it is huge, because there are a huge number of people in the market who do not want to think with their own heads, and buy some strange signals. I'm not sure that your signals, which you use, can steadily bring you $ 5,000 over and over again. Count later in a year how much you spent and how much you earned and then you can come back to the topic of this conversation again and find out who was deeply mistaken, you or me.

comments.author: speedy963
comments.body: Quote from: moviestar on May 17, 2022, 05:08:27 AMwas wondering if anyone has some good altcoin calls like for day trading, i heard about them as well as NFT calls and seems like a good way to get into investing... I know people sell these "calls" so ill be willing to pay. It would be better if you just try to learn for yourself but I understand, it is quite a hassle starting from scratch. A better way would be trying out a paid one. There are quite a lot out there and some don't only give out calls for apot trading but also for leveraged trades along with calls for good potential start up altcoins. Some also help you learn more about trading while giving out those signals. Of course, not all are legit and the effectiveness of profitability depends on the signal provider which varies depending on your budget for signals or calls. It would be better if you skip looking for people giving out free signals or calls since most of the time, you are just being used to pump and dump an altcoin. Be careful op and good luck. Hope you find great deals.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: Jaered on May 18, 2022, 09:12:34 AMI know one can swing trade his or her way to profit, but then that's a tough call with the market the way it is. About NFTs, that seems a strange one to me, because I don't even know how it is done. Anyway good luckThere's not that much difference if you're going to trade NFTs.Too many marketplaces for it these days and you just have to look at those NFTs that are currently popular and in demand. I have seen people making that much within a few days.But the usual is the same as holding bitcoin, it will take you several months of holding until you see the value of that NFT you hold to go up. That's not guaranteed to all NFTs that's why choosing wisely is needed before you buy.

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: Quote from: moviestar on May 17, 2022, 05:08:27 AM~Now that you mentioned day trading. I would say that top 10 coins in CMC would do although it was a pretty rough experience for me when I was learning day trading back then in Binance. I am not sure how it would go for NFTs though as I never ever touched them ever. If you're going for the trends, sure! Go for NFTs though I cannot recommend ya NFTs.

comments.author: speedy963
comments.body: Quote from: isaac_clarke22 on May 20, 2022, 09:09:40 PMQuote from: moviestar on May 17, 2022, 05:08:27 AM~Now that you mentioned day trading. I would say that top 10 coins in CMC would do although it was a pretty rough experience for me when I was learning day trading back then in Binance. I am not sure how it would go for NFTs though as I never ever touched them ever. If you're going for the trends, sure! Go for NFTs though I cannot recommend ya NFTs.NFTs are actually pretty fun brother, not inky do you get to collect artworks that catches your interest, you also get to make some profits by flipping hyped NFTs that are not the type you want to hold for long. There are tons of people right now that are flipping NFTs for profit which is why tons of NFT platforms have popped up ever since the NFTs became famous. Even on the bearish market there are still people creating, buying and selling NFTs on various platforms. I suggest you try it out, really worth your while.

comments.author: saladin7000
comments.body: frankly i personally am not affected by the signals that give the wind of heaven, i prefer to think alone and always do deep research about a project that is on the rise or that gives a signal about its growth, i think only beginners can be influenced and believe things like that,
